carSaleInfo.title: About this car

history.title: Car History
history.description1: We are the second owners of this vehicle, carefully maintained by its first family owners. It has always received the proper services and has been used both in the city and for trips.
history.description2: We continued its care and have mainly used it in Capital Federal and getaways to the coast.

whySell.title: Reason for Sale
whySell.description: We are selling this car due to a family opportunity that allowed us to acquire a newer model. It's time for someone else to enjoy it.

whyBuy.title: Why buy it?
whyBuy.description: It's our first car, so we explored multiple options to protect our investment. Three different mechanics vouch for it: excellent value for money and ready for many more kilometers.

doubts.title: Why choose a Japanese car?
doubts.description: While there may be models from Mercosur with fewer years or kilometers in its range, the quality and equipment of this vehicle is incomparable. No noises, materials in perfect condition, and it has only required routine maintenance. It's ready to enjoy.

ideal.title: Who is it ideal for?
ideal.city: For getting around the city: Low consumption and easy to park.
ideal.kids: For carrying the kids: Surprising interior space.
ideal.firstCar: For being your first car: Simple, reliable, and hassle-free.
ideal.travel: For traveling: Stability on the road with a sporty touch.

carSaleInfo.interested: Interested, right? You just need to see and test it! Write to us!
